meanings.definition: A group of artists who create abstract art using spontaneous brushstrokes.
meanings.sent1: The tachistes gathered in the studio to paint together.
meanings.sent2: The museum featured an exhibit showcasing the works of tachistes.
meanings.sent3: The tachistes decided to have a paint-off to see who could create the wildest artwork.
meanings.sent4: Her painting resembled the work of tachistes, with its bold strokes and vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The art class learned about tachistes and their unique approach to painting.

meanings.definition: The style or movement of art characterized by spontaneous brushstrokes and abstract forms.
meanings.sent1: The gallery displayed a collection of tachistes art pieces.
meanings.sent2: Art students studied the tachistes movement in their art history class.
meanings.sent3: The tachistes style inspired many young artists to experiment with abstract forms.
meanings.sent4: His artwork reflected the influence of tachistes, with its free-flowing brushstrokes.
meanings.sent5: The tachistes movement challenged traditional art norms with its innovative techniques.
